page.title: 05EDUCATION 1
page.content: The population of the area can receive education in four centres organised for three different age groups.Other people leave the area for education centres at Malmesbury, Swindon or Chippenham.Most Secondary age(twelve to eighteen) children go to Malmesbury Comprehensive School.At sixteen or eighteen years students transfer to Chippenham College of Higher Education.The youngest age group is for children two to five years old.They can attend the Kindergarten at R.A.F. Hullavington or the playgroup at Hullavington Community hall.There are 95 children between the ages of five and eleven attending Hullavington Primary School.There is an education centre at R.A.F. Hullavington for training Forces personnel.These are in the 18-45 years age group.
